name: Squarepuzzle
description:
Squarepuzzle is based on a puzzle made by an unknown designer and published in a Swedish magazine in the 1960s.

It's very straightforward. Just squeeze as many squares you can into the playing area. 

If you think you have found the optimal solution, you can change the size of the area for a new challenge. Also, you're welcome to write a comment with you score and percentage!
